account_new acc1 20000000

# Deploy Contract
transaction_build tx01
    sender acc1
    nonce 0
    receiver 00
    data

    build

block_build b01
    parent g00
    transactions tx01
    gasLimit 6800000
    build

block_connect b01
assert_best b01
assert_tx_success tx01

# Call .execute

    data 61461954 # execute()
    gas 6000000
    build

block_build b02
    parent b01
    transactions tx02
    gasLimit 6800000

block_connect b02
